SEARCH
Package controller.filesManagers

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
controller.filesManagers.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Class to load and manage audio. A custom music player is implemented. Fun mode lets you play music instead of Game original song.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AudioManager getInstance()
      Singleton

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates music. A timer prevents AudioManager to malfunction if called too many times in a short time. Sets current songs, next song, previous song, mute and fun mode.

    • playSong

      public void playSong(int i)
      Play song found at index i. Stops current songs and finds next song to play and set as current.
      Parameters:
      i - index of songs array

    • playSound

      public void playSound(int i)
      Plays sound at i index.
      Parameters:
      i - index of sounds array

    • switchMusic

      public void switchMusic()
      Switches from music on to off and vice versa

    • switchSound

      public void switchSound()
      switches from sound on to off and vice versa

    • switchMode

      public void switchMode()
      Switches from fun mode on to off and vice versa

    • startMusic

      public void startMusic()
      Starts music for the first time

    • nextSong

      public void nextSong()
      Plays next song in the array

    • previousSong

      public void previousSong()
      Plays previous song in the array

    • getSongName

      public String getSongName()
